title: FantasyRPG Music1
longDescription:
🎧️YoutubePreview


📖Overview.


The Versatile Fantasy Music Pack is a collection of music tracks suitable for Fantasy, RPG, Adventure games, and various genres. The included music emphasizes orchestration, cinematic richness, and sometimes evokes a dramatic atmosphere or warm scenes. It is ideal for use in games, animations, and various other projects.


🕹️Functionality.


  • Diverse Musical Styles: Includes various styles such as Orchestral, Cinematic, Ambient, and more.
  • Scene Setting: Provides music suitable for grand and dramatic atmospheres, as well as warm and elegant scenes.
  • For Games and Animations: Particularly suitable for RPGs, adventures, fantasy games, and animation projects.

⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 25
  • Number of Audio Cue: 25
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided: 1:04:50
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12LU ~
  • Average Momentary : -8LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : -0.5dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
